objectCollectionView.documentation: This view displays all users with archetype "Person"

searchItem.description: Allow searching for users having account on specific resource. Intent is not considered. The search item is not displayed by default (visibleByDefault=false).

filter.q:text: linkRef/@ matches ( . type ShadowType and resourceRef/@/name = `resourceParameter?.getName()?.getOrig()` and kind = "account" )

searchItem.description: Allow searching for users not having account on specific resource. Intent is not considered. The search item is not displayed by default (visibleByDefault=false).

filter.q:text: linkRef/@ not matches ( . type ShadowType and resourceRef/@/name = `resourceParameter?.getName()?.getOrig()` and kind = "account" )

expressionProfile.description: "Safe" expression profile. It is supposed to contain only operations that are "safe", i.e. operations that have very little risk to harm the system, circumvent midPoint security and so on. Use of those operations should be reasonably safe in all expressions. However, there are limitations. This profile may incomplete or it may even be not completely secure. Proper security testing of this profile was not yet conducted. It is provided here "AS IS", without any guarantees. Use at your own risk.

package.name: com.evolveum.midpoint.xml.ns._public.common.common_3
package.description: MidPoint common schema - generated bean classes

class.name: java.lang.String
class.description: String operations are generally safe. But Groovy is adding execute() method which is very dangerous.

class.name: java.util.List
class.description: List operations are generally safe. But Groovy is adding execute() method which is very dangerous.

class.name: java.util.ArrayList
class.description: List operations are generally safe. But Groovy is adding execute() method which is very dangerous.

class.name: java.lang.System
class.description: Just a few methods of System are safe enough.

class.name: java.lang.IllegalStateException
class.description: Basic Java exception. Also used in test.
